title: Moderne Typefaces with Lots of Character
content:
Hi Folks. I’m trying to find some new Moderne typefaces with lots of character...along the lines of Perla, Stilla and Fat Face. Anyone have favorites they want to recommend?

comments.content:
When you say “moderne” do you mean “modern serif” or [Didone](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Didone)?  
Here are some of my favorites:

[Carousel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/carousel_regular/)  
 [Normande](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Normande%20OT)  
 [Ambroise](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Ambroise)  
 [Didona](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/didona_book_ot/)  
 [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/didoni_normal_ot_std_urw/)  
 [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/caslon_graphique_ot_std/)  
... and [more ball terminaled wonders](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040500/http:/typographica.org/001077.php)
yeah, I love that typographic blog post, but I’m looking for more, slightly more unconventional. I’m not sure...
